results.text_hl: Recently, there have been investigations on @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@) as a potential treatment for @<m>DISEASE_Bone_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001847 @@@bone diseases@@@ such as @DISEASE_Osteoporosis @DISEASE_MESH:D010024 @@@osteoporosis@@@, as researchers have outlined that @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes mellitus@@@ (@DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@T2DM@@@) poses an increased risk of @DISEASE_Fractures_Bone @DISEASE_MESH:D050723 @@@fractures@@@.
